name: find a focus
description:
- when is this applicable?
 - do we do this on actuators?
 - what is the role of actuators in the higher sense?
 - is it moving tank treads? isn't that always allowed?
 - is it moving to an adjacent room? how does that mesh with the greater context?
 - basically, are actuators learnable to? to what level of complexity (in terms of hierarchy planning)?
